solution_line_template: That means she uses {watt_hours_per_day} watt hours/day * {days_per_week} days/week = <<{watt_hours_per_day}*{days_per_week}={watt_hours_per_week}>>{watt_hours_per_week} watt hours/week
This is {watt_hours_per_week} watt hours / {watts_per_kw} watts/kw = <<{watt_hours_per_week}/{watts_per_kw}={kw_hours_per_week}>>{kw_hours_per_week} kw hours
So her TV cost {kw_hours_per_week} kw hours/week * ${cost_per_kw_hour}/kw hour = $<<{kw_hours_per_week}*{cost_per_kw_hour}={weekly_cost_dollars}>>{weekly_cost_dollars}/week
